name: Matija
backstory: Architect of immersive game worlds, crafting detailed environments that feel lived-in and authentic. Matija joined Eridan Games Studio in September 2025, bringing his own games and worlds to the studio. His expertise in world-building ensures that every location tells a story and feels like a real place with its own history, culture, and secrets. Matija's attention to detail makes game worlds feel alive and believable, enhancing player immersion and engagement.

traits.advantage: Can design worlds that feel like they existed before the game
traits.feat: Created detailed world designs for multiple game projects
traits.quirk: Maps out every location with architectural precision
